content: Hello! Thanks for reaching out to XYZ Home Services. May I have your name to get started with your plumbing service request?
Thank you, Brad! Can you please provide the address where you need the plumbing service?
Great, thanks! Could you please tell me a bit more about the plumbing issue you’re experiencing?
My kitchen sink is leaking underneath. Not flooding but it’s pretty annoying.
Thank you for the details, Brad. When would be the best time for one of our plumbers to come out and take a look at your kitchen sink leak? We have appointments as early as tomorrow.
Uh, how much would it cost just to get someone to look at it? I don’t want another huge bill.
Great question, Brad. I can provide a general price estimate based on the issue. Would you like a rough estimate for a kitchen sink leak inspection?
Yes, just the basics. I just really want to know if it’ll be super expensive or not.

For a typical kitchen sink leak inspection, the estimate is usually between $65 and $95 for the visit. The exact cost will depend on the nature of the problem and whether any repairs are needed. There are no hidden fees, and if repairs are needed, the plumber will discuss options and pricing before starting any work.

Would you like to book an appointment for the inspection?
I just need to think about it. Can I message you back if I want to set something up?
reason: Customer felt pressured and chose not to proceed—wants time to think.
